attributes.action: Stop the possibility of a 2nd Vote. Britain voted Leave 52% to 48%.
attributes.additional_details:
The deal Theresa May has potentially agreed with the EU is a farce. 

No deal must be better than farce that has been proposed, We should propose a no deal exit saving the UK £36bn which can be put into our public services. Create more Jobs for customs checks, have an Australian style border, if you don't bring something to the UK then why should you be here
attributes.background:
Stop the possibility of a 2nd Vote. Britain voted Leave 52% to 48%.

The government have now been granted to possibility of revoking Article 50, this is wrong. We need to push for the UK Parliament to leave the EU, deal or not.
